verses.verse: These <S%H428><s%> be the <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> on this <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> in the <S%H6160>plain<s%> over <S%H4136>against<s%> the <S%H5489>Red<s%> sea, <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H6290>Paran,<s%> and <S%H8603>Tophel,<s%> and <S%H3837>Laban,<s%> and <S%H2698>Hazeroth,<s%> and <S%H1774>Dizahab.<s%>

(There are <S%H259>eleven<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> journey from <S%H4480>Horeb<s%> <S%H2722><s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H6947>Kadesh-barnea.)<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> in the <S%H705>fortieth<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> in the <S%H6249>eleventh<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> on the <S%H259>first<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> according unto <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had given him in <S%H6680>commandment<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them;

After <S%H310><s%> he had <S%H5221>slain<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H2809>Heshbon,<s%> and <S%H5747>Og<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> at <S%H6252>Astaroth<s%> in Edrei: <S%H154><s%>

On this <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> <S%H2974>began<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> to <S%H874>declare<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H8451>law,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> us in <S%H2722>Horeb,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Ye have <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> long <S%H7227>enough<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> mount: <S%H2022><s%>

Turn <S%H6437><s%> you, and take your <S%H5265>journey,<s%> and <S%H935>go<s%> to the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> and <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the places <S%H7934>nigh<s%> thereunto, in the <S%H6160>plain,<s%> in the <S%H2022>hills,<s%> and in the <S%H8219>vale,<s%> and in the <S%H5045>south,<s%> and by the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H2348>side,<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> and unto <S%H3844>Lebanon,<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5104>river,<s%> the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H6578>Euphrates.<s%>

Behold, <S%H7200><s%> I have <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you: go <S%H935>in<s%> and <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> unto your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> unto them and to their <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them.
And I <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> you at <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H6256>time,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> I am not <S%H3201>able<s%> <S%H3808><s%> to <S%H5375>bear<s%> you myself alone: <S%H905><s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> you, and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> ye are this <S%H3117>day<s%> as the <S%H3556>stars<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> for <S%H7230>multitude.<s%>

(The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers<s%> make you a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> so many <S%H3254>more<s%> as ye are, and <S%H1288>bless<s%> you, <S%H834>as<s%> he hath <S%H1696>promised<s%> you!)
How <S%H349><s%> can I myself <S%H905>alone<s%> <S%H5375>bear<s%> your <S%H2960>encumbrance,<s%> and your <S%H4853>burden,<s%> and your <S%H7379>strife?<s%>

Take <S%H3051><s%> you <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H376>men,<s%> and <S%H995>understanding,<s%> and <S%H3045>known<s%> among your <S%H7626>tribes,<s%> and I will <S%H7760>make<s%> them <S%H7218>rulers<s%> over you.
And ye <S%H6030>answered<s%> me, and <S%H559>said,<s%> The <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou hast <S%H1696>spoken<s%> is <S%H2896>good<s%> for us to <S%H6213>do.<s%>

So I <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7218>chief<s%> of your <S%H7626>tribes,<s%> <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H376>men,<s%> and <S%H3045>known,<s%> and <S%H5414>made<s%> them <S%H7218>heads<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> you, <S%H8269>captains<s%> over <S%H505>thousands,<s%> and <S%H8269>captains<s%> over <S%H3967>hundreds,<s%> and <S%H8269>captains<s%> over <S%H2572>fifties,<s%> and <S%H8269>captains<s%> over <S%H6235>tens,<s%> and <S%H7860>officers<s%> among your <S%H7626>tribes.<s%>

And I <S%H6680>charged<s%> <S%H853><s%> your <S%H8199>judges<s%> at <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H6256>time,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H8085>Hear<s%> the causes <S%H996>between<s%> your <S%H251>brethren,<s%> and <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H6664>righteously<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> and his <S%H251>brother,<s%> and the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> that is with him.

Ye shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5234>respect<s%> <S%H6440>persons<s%> in <S%H4941>judgment;<s%> but ye shall <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H6996>small<s%> as well as the <S%H1419>great;<s%> ye shall <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H1481>afraid<s%> of the <S%H4480>face<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of <S%H376>man;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> is <S%H430>God's:<s%> and the <S%H1697>cause<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is too <S%H7185>hard<s%> <S%H4480>for<s%> you, <S%H7126>bring<s%> it <S%H413>unto<s%> me, and I will <S%H8085>hear<s%> it.
And I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you at <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H6256>time<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>things<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> ye should <S%H6213>do.<s%>

And when we <S%H5265>departed<s%> from <S%H4480>Horeb,<s%> <S%H2722><s%> we went <S%H1980>through<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H3372>terrible<s%> <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> ye <S%H7200>saw<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> us; and we <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H5704>to<s%> <S%H6947>Kadesh-barnea.<s%>

And I <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> you, Ye are <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> doth <S%H5414>give<s%> unto us.

Behold, <S%H7200><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee: go <S%H5927>up<s%> and <S%H3423>possess<s%> it, <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of thy <S%H1>fathers<s%> hath <S%H1696>said<s%> unto thee; <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H408>not,<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> be <S%H2865>discouraged.<s%>

And ye came <S%H7126>near<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me every <S%H3605>one<s%> of you, and <S%H559>said,<s%> We will <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> us, and they shall search us <S%H2658>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H7725>bring<s%> us <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H853>again<s%> by <S%H834>what<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> we must go <S%H5927>up,<s%> <S%H853>and<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> we shall <S%H935>come.<s%>

And the <S%H1697>saying<s%> pleased me <S%H3190>well:<s%> <S%H5869><s%> and I <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> you, <S%H259>one<s%> of a tribe: <S%H7626><s%>

And they <S%H6437>turned<s%> and went <S%H5927>up<s%> into the <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of <S%H812>Eshcol,<s%> and searched it <S%H7270>out.<s%> <S%H853><s%>

And they <S%H3947>took<s%> of the <S%H4480>fruit<s%> <S%H6529><s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> in their <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and brought it <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> us, and <S%H7725>brought<s%> us <S%H1697>word<s%> again, and <S%H559>said,<s%> It is a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> doth <S%H5414>give<s%> us.
Notwithstanding ye <S%H14>would<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> go <S%H5927>up,<s%> but rebelled <S%H4784>against<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your God: <S%H430><s%>

And ye <S%H7279>murmured<s%> in your <S%H168>tents,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> Because the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8135>hated<s%> us, he hath brought us <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> to <S%H5414>deliver<s%> us into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> to <S%H8045>destroy<s%> us.

Whither <S%H575><s%> shall <S%H587>we<s%> go <S%H5927>up?<s%> our <S%H251>brethren<s%> have <S%H4549>discouraged<s%> <S%H853><s%> our <S%H3824>heart,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> The <S%H5971>people<s%> is <S%H1419>greater<s%> and <S%H7311>taller<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> we; the <S%H5892>cities<s%> are <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H1219>walled<s%> up to <S%H8064>heaven;<s%> and <S%H1571>moreover<s%> we have <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H6062>Anakims<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>
Then I <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> you, <S%H6206>Dread<s%> <S%H3808>not,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> them.

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> which <S%H1980>goeth<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you, <S%H1931>he<s%> shall <S%H3898>fight<s%> for you, according to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H854>for<s%> you in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> before your <S%H5869>eyes;<s%>

And in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> thou hast <S%H7200>seen<s%> how <S%H834>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5375>bore<s%> thee, <S%H834>as<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> doth <S%H5375>bear<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> ye <S%H1980>went,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> ye <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H5704>into<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place.<s%>
Yet in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> ye did <S%H369>not<s%> <S%H539>believe<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%>

Who <S%H1980>went<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you, to search you <S%H8446>out<s%> a <S%H4725>place<s%> to pitch your <S%H2583>tents<s%> in, in <S%H784>fire<s%> by <S%H3915>night,<s%> to <S%H7200>show<s%> you by <S%H834>what<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> ye should <S%H1980>go,<s%> and in a <S%H6051>cloud<s%> by <S%H3119>day.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of your <S%H1697>words,<s%> and was <S%H7107>wroth,<s%> and <S%H7650>swore,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Surely <S%H518><s%> there shall not <S%H376>one<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1755>generation<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H853><s%> that <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H7650>swore<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> unto your <S%H1>fathers,<s%>

Save <S%H2108><s%> <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh;<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> it, and to him will I <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he hath <S%H1869>trodden<s%> upon, and to his <S%H1121>children,<s%> <S%H3282>because<s%> <S%H834><s%> he hath <S%H4390>wholly<s%> <S%H310>followed<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Also <S%H1571><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was <S%H599>angry<s%> with me for your <S%H1558>sakes,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H859>Thou<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> go <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H8033>thither.<s%>

But <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun,<s%> which <S%H5975>standeth<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee, <S%H1931>he<s%> shall go <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H8033>thither:<s%> <S%H2388>encourage<s%> him: <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> shall <S%H853>cause<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H5157>inherit<s%> it.

Moreover your little <S%H2945>ones,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> ye <S%H559>said<s%> should <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H957>prey,<s%> and your <S%H1121>children,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> in that <S%H3117>day<s%> had no <S%H3045>knowledge<s%> <S%H3808><s%> between <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H7451>evil,<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> shall go <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H8033>thither,<s%> and unto them will I <S%H5414>give<s%> it, and <S%H1992>they<s%> shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> it.
But as for <S%H859>you,<s%> <S%H6437>turn<s%> you, and take your <S%H5265>journey<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

Then ye <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, We have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H587>we<s%> will go <S%H5927>up<s%> and <S%H3898>fight,<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> us. And when ye had girded <S%H2296>on<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H3627>weapons<s%> of <S%H4421>war,<s%> ye were <S%H1951>ready<s%> to go <S%H5927>up<s%> into the <S%H2022>hill.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H559>Say<s%> unto them, Go not <S%H5927>up,<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H3898>fight;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I am <S%H369>not<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> you; <S%H3808>lest<s%> ye be <S%H5062>smitten<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H341>enemies.<s%>

So I <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> you; and ye would <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8085>hear,<s%> but rebelled <S%H4784>against<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and went presumptuously <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H2102><s%> into the <S%H2022>hill.<s%>

And the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> which <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> came <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> you, and <S%H7291>chased<s%> you, <S%H834>as<s%> <S%H1682>bees<s%> <S%H6213>do,<s%> and <S%H3807>destroyed<s%> you in <S%H8165>Seir,<s%> even <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H2767>Hormah.<s%>

And ye <S%H7725>returned<s%> and <S%H1058>wept<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> but the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> would <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8085>hearken<s%> to your <S%H6963>voice,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> give <S%H238>ear<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> you.
So ye <S%H3427>abode<s%> in <S%H6946>Kadesh<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> according unto the <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> ye <S%H3427>abode<s%> there.
